description:
Keep it simple and safe. This life vest is designed to fit comfortably and securely, while allowing maximum freedom of movement. The low-profile foam wraps the back for comfort when sitting, with lots of adjustment options to fine tune the fit. Two large zippered pockets keep your sunscreen and other personal items handy.

  • 210-denier nylon ripstop is lightweight, quick-drying and durable
  • Adjustable shoulder straps are padded and contoured for comfort
  • Gaia PE foam is PVC-free, low profile, and shaped for maximum range of motion
  • Front zip entry makes for easy on/off
  • 2 zippered pockets provide secure storage, 2 fleece-lined handwarmer pockets warm your hands on chilly days
name: Kokatat WKNDR PFD - Unisex
